about.name: Alexandre Guillemot
about.p1: Currently in my 3rd year of a BUT MMI degree, specializing in Web Development.
about.p2: I design high-performance digital solutions by bridging technical rigor with creative ergonomics.
about.p3: My 3-month immersion in Japan strengthened my autonomy and my ability to thrive in complex international environments.

services.title: My Services
services.subtitle: Technical and creative solutions tailored to your digital needs.

fullstack.title: Fullstack Development
fullstack.desc: Designing complete, high-performance web applications. I manage the entire production chain, from dynamic Front-end to structured Back-end.

immersive.title: Immersive Experiences & Web 3D
immersive.desc: Creating innovative interfaces by integrating interactive 3D elements via Three.js and A-Frame for unique user experiences.

design.title: UI/UX Design & Prototyping
design.desc: User-centric interface design. Developing wireframes and high-fidelity interactive prototypes on Figma.

management.title: Project Management & Agile Methods
management.desc: Rigorous organization and monitoring of development cycles using the Scrum method to ensure objectives are met.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: My technological arsenal for web development.

rigor.title: Rigor & Organization
rigor.desc: Structured project management via Trello and MindView.

adapt.title: Adaptability
adapt.desc: Ability to quickly gain proficiency in new environments.

team.title: Team Spirit
team.desc: Active collaborator in Agile mode, promoting communication.

curiosity.title: Technical Curiosity
curiosity.desc: Constant monitoring of web innovation and new interactions.

proposal.title: Proactive Approach
proposal.desc: Ability to suggest creative and technical improvements.

empathy.title: User Empathy
empathy.desc: Human-centered approach to designing intuitive interfaces.

solving.title: Problem Solving
solving.desc: Methodical and calm approach to technical challenges.

versatility.title: Versatility
versatility.desc: Ease in navigating between graphic design and development.

formations.section_subtitle: Technical and creative training focused on digital technology.

mmi.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Multimedia and the Internet (MMI)
mmi.details: Multidisciplinary training structured around 3 major poles:
mmi.pole1: Development: Fullstack Programming (PHP/Laravel, JS/React/Vue), Web 3D (Three.js, A-Frame).
mmi.pole2: Design: Interface Design (UI) and graphic creation (Adobe Suite, Figma).
mmi.pole3: Management & Com: Project organization (MindView, Trello, Agile Methods).

bac.institution: Claude de France High School, Romorantin-Lanthenay
bac.details: Diploma obtained with honors (Mention Assez Bien). Solid foundation in algorithms, networks, and digital systems.

sendai.title: NIT Sendai Internship (Japan)
sendai.desc: Physiological analysis of cognitive engagement in immersion.
sendai.fullDesc: Development of a brainwave (EEG) and biometrics analysis interface. This internship in Japan allowed me to grow in an international context, requiring me to communicate complex technical data exclusively in English.

riders.title: Riders of Berk
riders.desc: Immersive web platform for data narration.
riders.fullDesc: Immersive web platform with multi-user management. Includes a CSV import module, JWT security, and Doctrine ORM. 3D scenes integration via Three.js.

tendance.title: Tendance or Not
tendance.fullDesc: Creation of a site with a like system, comments, and popular content management. Focus on UX design and project management via Scrum agile methodology.

project_japon.title: Neuroscience & Cognitive Engagement
project_japon.main_desc: 3-month research internship aiming to quantify student engagement based on learning format (VR, Video, Text) via real-time biometric data.
project_japon.eeg_desc: Analysis of Alpha (calm), Beta (concentration), and Gamma (deep engagement) waves to assess cognitive load.
project_japon.bio_desc: Correlation between heart rate variability and stress. Using AI to transform raw signals into actionable mappings.

project_riders.subtitle: Fullstack Application & Data Storytelling
project_riders.context_p1: This project is an immersive platform dedicated to exploring and analyzing data from the "How to Train Your Dragon" universe. The main challenge was to transform a complex database into a smooth narrative interface.
project_riders.context_p2: The site operates as a dynamic CMS: CRUD management, CSV import, and interactive statistical visualizations.
project_riders.arch_desc: Implementation of a modern architecture using Symfony 6 and React.
project_riders.data_desc: MySQL database design and statistical data aggregation.
project_riders.auth_desc: JWT authentication management for secure back-office access.

project_tendance.subtitle: Web Polling Application
project_tendance.context_p1: "Tendance or Not" is an interactive social platform designed to allow users to create, share, and vote on trending polls.
project_tendance.context_p2: The site features a personalized profile management system and a dynamic voting interface to visualize trends in real-time.
project_tendance.mvc_desc: Native PHP development following the MVC pattern for a clear separation of business logic.
project_tendance.data_desc: SQL database modeling optimized for user relationships and vote integrity.
project_tendance.logic_desc: Implementation of calculation scripts for results and popular poll displays.

hobbies.title: Hobbies & Passions
hobbies.subtitle: What feeds my curiosity and shapes my analytical mind outside of web development.

volley.title: Volleyball
volley.desc: Practiced in a club, this sport taught me the importance of team cohesion, constant communication, and reactivity under pressure.

japan.title: Culture & Japan
japan.desc: Passionate about Japanese history and culture. My 3-month immersion in Sendai developed my adaptability and open-mindedness.

aviation.title: Engineering & Aviation
aviation.desc: Strong interest in vehicle engineering and military aviation. I enjoy analyzing technical complexity and the evolution of these systems.

gaming.title: Video Games
gaming.desc: Passionate about strategy and simulation games (War Thunder). This allows me to explore engineering and sharpen my tactical sense.

contact.title: Let's Talk!
contact.subtitle: Have a question or a project? Feel free to reach out via the form or my social networks.
